title: Wanton
overview: On a fateful night, the lives of three friends descend into chaos after one of them commits a gruesome crime in a nightclub.

title: Stolliez
overview: Urban generation of young adults are part of a traditional yet uncommon culture. Four young males take you through havoc in Milwaukee streets. Attaining instant manifestation, but through the lens of four discombobulated young men. Stealing foreign cars, selling stolen cars for a profit, and super reckless driving through the city streets is what’s hot.

title: Asking for It
overview: A victim of a crime quickly becomes the suspect.

title: Desconocidos
overview: A short crime thriller film.

title: Welcome To The Party
overview: A criminal encounters Britain’s newest vigilante and must FACE the consequences.  - Made for the Encounters film festival DepicT competition and winner of the Action Xtreme action award.

title: shoplift3rz
overview: Three teenaged shoplifters get a taste of the real world when they get tangled in serious crime allegations.

title: Tres
overview: Three individuals are caught in a web of lies, crime and murder.

title: Ravana Lanka
overview: Four friends go to Goa for vacation but one of them dies under mysterious circumstances. The others manage to escape but one day one of them gets kidnapped. Will they be able to find her?

title: The Underdog
overview: Tells about the friendship of 2 policemen of different beliefs and about the life of the police with all their inner conflicts, because a policeman is not just a job but a service.

title: Anna from Ebuhando
overview: Anna Khamasi Omutsani is a widow. One day, her husband Peter Dianga goes to work and doesn’t return home. Anna’s attempts to contact him on the phone are fruitless. After a restless night, the neighbour girl Abigael knocks on the window and reports that she had seen Peter lying in the stream under the bridge. Men from the community pull his body out. The police pronounce him dead, but do not investigate the circumstances of his death.  The Council of Elders, convened under the shade of a mango tree, deals with the existential affairs of the community. The Council decides Peter Dianga’s death was an accident, so he is buried properly, to the right of the door of the house.  Anna’s greatest dream is to educate her children – the source of Anna’s quiet yet proud strength.

title: Screwjob
overview: Screwjob (2023)  Three criminals, Mikey, Jimmy and Dice are sent on a job to steal a painting. Mikey and Dice joke and play around and this angers Jimmy during the process. When it's time to meet the boss for the exchange, something goes wrong with the payment which leads Mikey to find Jimmy and deal with him.

title: Can overfitted deep neural networks in adversarial training generalize? – An approximation viewpoint
overview: In this talk, I will discuss whether overfitted DNNs in adversarial training can generalize from an approximation viewpoint. We prove by construction the existence of infinitely many adversarial training classifiers on over-parameterized DNNs that obtain arbitrarily small adversarial training error (overfitting), whereas achieving good robust generalization error under certain conditions concerning the data quality, well separated, and perturbation level. This construction is optimal and thus points out the fundamental limits of DNNs under adversarial training with statistical guarantees. Part of this talk comes from our recent work.
tagline: Analysis

title: The Frogfather
overview: In a world laced with betrayal, only the Frogfather can settle the score.
tagline: Tonight, they sleep with the tadpoles.

title: "Continua a girare"
overview: A true crime documentary shooting is overturned by the disappearance of a few troupe members...

title: Live
overview: In the heart of Dhaka, a chilling murder rocks Milon's apartment, leaving his wife Jaya unconscious and the prime suspect. As police unravel a web of mysterious disappearances and shocking secrets, the investigation spirals towards a heart-wrenching climax.

title: A Cooking Case
overview: After a cooking competition becomes deadly a pair of detectives try and discover who’s at fault for a murder
tagline: Where Nothing Is What It Seems

title: Kine (ቅኔ)
overview: Prepared by Batiya Films kib film Presents
tagline: A film by Yared Girma (Yoyo)

title: High Rise: Path to Nowhere
overview: A high-stakes thriller that will leave you breathless. In a world of the rich and powerful, a group of detectives are on the trail of a deadly drug cartel.
tagline: Ten Grand. My Man.

title: Hello Stella
overview: After learning that he has a child on the way, an amateur hitman has to leave behind the criminal world before it destroys his family life.

title: Linkedd 2 : The Multiverse-al Objection
overview: Linkedd accidentally opens the door to the multiverse, and there gets sent to court and has to find a way to close the door again
tagline: Home Sweet Home

title: After the Sirens
overview: Aiming to expose the extreme mental and emotional demands of being a police officer, After The Sirens is an intimate documentary that unmasks how mental health is perceived and addressed in the police force from first hand accounts. The film invites viewers to consider the mental resilience required to be an officer, with conversations surrounding trauma exposure, emotional labour, multiculturalism and personal experiences of coping. Through displaying the force’s involvement in a recent traumatic case, as well as the trauma encountered throughout their individual careers, the documentary offers the opportunity to go inside the policing mind.
tagline: Aiming to expose the extreme mental and emotional demands of being a police officer, After the Sirens is an intimate documentary that unmasks how mental health is perceived and addressed in the police force from first hand accounts.

title: Wrong Bill
overview: Two people kidnap someone only to find out it wasn’t who they thought it was.
tagline: It pays to pay attention.

title: Golden Figure
overview: A detective takes on the case of finding a valuable Lego in order to save her practice from closing.

title: The Tale of Dylan, Jimin, Brad and Eugene
overview: A Nerd called Eugene meets up with his friends, but not is all as it seems, slowly the gang gets killed off one by one.

title: Sins of the Future
overview: A man who mourns the murder of his daughter has the ability to travel back in time but there's a catch...he can't change the outcome of his own timeline and he can only travel to a very specific moment in time.
tagline: "I wanted to see the fear in his face"

title: Bajo la Tumba de la Inocencia
Streets
overview: When his best friend is murdered in cold blood, Michael must try and figure out who did it and bring them to justice.

title: The Rat's Nest
overview: Three brothers sort out their differences.

title: I Just Killed a Man!
overview: Two people accidently kill a man.

title: The Expert
overview: A man helping to investigate his wife's murder finds out that she was a government agent. Problems arise when he realizes that they may be responsible for her death.

title: The Hollow Men
overview: A world-weary hitman must reconsider his life choices when he is forced to come face to face with his target.

title: Perfect Business
overview: A low-budget comedy.

title: Skeleton of the Bones
overview: Hey this skeleton is crazyyyyyy!!!!!!!! Sofia cerasoli is a papers of this has fun yes she laughs around
tagline: No skeleboners here!!! just fun murder kill kill kill kill kill I need to kill kill kill kill

title: the crazy guy
overview: A crazy guy moves into A apartment and finds his neighbor and ends up killing him

title: Spending Some Time Together
overview: This is the story of Joshua Anderson. A man who falls in love with Rose Starling, a woman he stalks at the super market. His love and passion for her push him to extreme lengths, such as kidnapping her. But his reign of terror doesn't stop there and we follow him on his horrifying and delusional journey to make his relationship with Rose work out. As the story unravels Joshua's plans seem to start falling apart due to the many challenging obstacles he faces. One of the obstacles being detective David James keeping a close eye on him due to his connection to a crime scene

title: Cliché
overview: A young man with an ordinary life witnesses a murder. To survive, he will go through a lot of adventures that gather clichés from cinema.

title: The Dame, The Detective, And The Midnight Murder
overview: When Jess, a hit-woman married to a detective, gets herself caught in an elaborate corrupt-cop scheme, she must do whatever she can to stop Robert, her husband's co-worker, from putting them both in the jail, or even killed.

title: Shehri Gabru
overview: Three unemployed bachelors and two local goons leading their life separately, get a deadline of seven days to pay a large amount of money..

title: Hollywood
overview: After failing to become an actor in Hollywood, Tommy turns to selling cocaine to make ends meet. A botched drug deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug dealer and scrambling desperately to come up with the cash to pay for his freedom.

title: The Day of the Coyote
overview: In a garret overlooking the main square, a professional hitman awaits a very important target. He coldly, efficiently, snaps together the pieces of his sniper rifle.But there’s a screw missing. Time for the universe to have some fun.

title: Mukhya Gamanika
overview: A young constable stumbles into a deadly maze. The tragic murder of his father, coinciding with the disappearance of a husband, ignites a chase for the truth, forcing him to confront hidden dangers and protect what's dear.

title: Slanted Gutter
overview: Down on his luck and soon to be divorced, a troubled man is convinced by his best friend to seek solace in revenge.

title: LIZ
overview: An alien sent to study humans on Earth faces inhumanity when it stumbles upon a college party.
tagline: An alien clambers into a party, what happens next?

title: The Believer
overview: A young gangster is torn between right and wrong on the day of his 18th birthday.

title: C'est la mort
overview: A crime drama short student film.

title: Samsara
overview: Samsara is a loose adaptation of "The Egg by Andy Weir". It follows the life of Suryan a hired assassin whose work life begins to affect his family which then eventually bleeds into the afterlife.
tagline: "You will be nothing but a fading memory over time"

title: Friend of the Friendless
overview: Law professor Chris Gallivan examines the career of one of our country's best defence lawyers, Greg King. Through the lens of King's most sensational case – the defence of Ewen Macdonald for the murder of Scott Guy - Gallivan also raises serious questions about the state of criminal justice in New Zealand today.

title: SNAPSHOT
overview: Two detectives arrive at a murder scene where the killer has left a chilling photo, which leads them on a trail of clues towards a deadly realisation.
tagline: The perfect shot requires the perfect setup

title: Cuál Justicia?
overview: A law student mother races against time to find her recently missing daughter
tagline: Everything fair should be law

title: The Last Photo
overview: At the end of the working day, a policeman, medical expert, and investigator arrive at the place of the suicide. The routine investigation and testimony of the fiancee do not lead to anything suspicious. But one mistake and an ordinary working day turn into a fight against moral and ethical principles and the question of where the lines of our compassion end.

title: Quid Pro Quo
overview: At the party, Faye drives all the men crazy, hoping to find what she still hasn't got - love. At the same time, Arthur steals an expensive painting from the mansion. But by chance, he ends up locked in a room with the beautiful Faye…
tagline: There are many secrets behind closed doors...

title: Live Fast Die Young: May-Money-Murda-Wood
overview: Females in the city of Maywood are coming up missing across the town.  Bodies are being discovered with missing body parts and organs.

title: Empty Pocket
overview: Two pickpockets wanted a little more cash. So they stupidly accepted a job to steal from a psychopath. Of course it goes wrong and the two thieves are hunted by a lunatic who enjoys opening throats a little too much.

title: The Dealer
overview: When a drug pusher is recruited to infiltrate a netherworld of addiction; one cop's desperate attempt at redemption will force an enemy's hand, setting off a chain of events with no easy exits.
tagline: It begins with addiction

title: Hidden Currents
overview: A couple visits a lake house for a weekend away, but secrets always come to the surface.

title: Rusty Lightnin' Kick Starts
overview: Rusty Lightnin', a goofy cowboy spokesman for a local car dealership, peddles a crowdfunding campaign in lo-fi TV spots. But the actor behind the cowboy, Leonard, is secretly an informant for ATF agents looking to bust the dealership's owner for firearms trafficking.

title: Sander's Documentary
overview: Stand-up comedy seems like an easy thing to do  - you get on stage, tell funny stories for an hour and also swear a little.  Sander Õigus has been doing stand-up for over ten years, let's see how the truth becomes the truth and a joke becomes a joke.

title: Family Ties
overview: In early-1980s Portsmouth, the Calvario family is reigning over the crime-ridden city. After a long-desired promotion, Russ must hope that luck is on his side in dealing with his new responsibilities, his ex-wife, and a loose cannon partner.

title: The Coney
overview: Neighborhood nice guy Diontay (Tay) Wilson is thrust into an uncomfortable situation after witnessing the murder of his estranged lover in his workplace, the neighborhood Coney Island Restaurant. Because of his tumultuous relationship with the deceased party, Diontay is considered a suspect by the police as well as the family of the deceased and commits all of his efforts to clear his name so he can pursue his dream of moving away to college all while under the watchful eye of the real killer.

title: TranHeist
overview: A pre-operative transsexual woman named Morgan chooses to steal money from her friend's drug dealing boyfriend to fund her gender confirmation surgery.

title: Nail Gun
overview: Three affluent men, who are responsible for the death of a girl, must survive against a killer set on revenge.

title: The 4 Kings
overview: Four crime bosses attend a secret meeting to discuss the possibility of a mole within their organization.
tagline: 4 KINGS ENTER. 1 KING LEAVES.

title: Will You Come Up?
overview: Hyuk, whose life crashed due to one wrong choice, works as an apartment security guard. You're in a nightmare situation that puts you in the test again. What kind of choice will he make this time?

title: The Watch
overview: Amateur thief Ollie attempts to steal a $17,000 watch. Meanwhile, Mick is running late for a house-sitting job.
tagline: When time runs out, survival kicks in

title: The Albacore Club
overview: A rideshare driver looking for some quick cash gets involved with a situation beyond his control.
tagline: What could go wrong?

title: Detective Fuge Files- Case File: 1683A7R
overview: Detective Fuge is given a new case to investigate the kidnapping of actress, Mary Partoski. And he finds out the perpetrators are run by and old associate of Fuges.
tagline: A hero meets a new foe

title: Ingu Mirugangal VaazhumIdam
overview: John works in Security Guard Office and is raising his only daughter, Jenny, as a Mother and Father. Genie, who has an inordinate affection for her father, looks after John like a mother. Her boyfriend Madam takes Jeni alone and rapes and murders her along with his friends. John takes revenge on his daughter's murderer and eventually goes insane

title: Soul Virginity
overview: English feature film. a group of original six short movies, with a variety of style and presentation. featuring exciting artistic elements comprised of drama, horror, Sci-fi, mystery and crime.

title: The emergence of the colossus. History of the rise and fall of the Nephlim
overview: Valente is a young man who works collecting garbage. One morning in the middle of the day he has to pick up gravel, among old sacks he finds a radiant mask. The encounter motivates him to dedicate himself to fighting, becoming over the years the best fighter of his time thanks to the mask, but when he loses it and is unmasked, misfortune falls on him.

title: Pain Killer
overview: While on route to a booty call, a migraine-addled young woman finds herself facing off against the criminal underbelly of Friday night Christchurch.
tagline: Seize the Night

title: Quiapo Blues
overview: A student becomes a target of accusations, leading to infamy and social isolation. His best friend steps-in to challenge societal prejudices into his own hands.

title: Aadrika
overview: Plot details under wraps.

title: The Scissors
overview: A man enters a mysterious office and is given sinister instructions.

title: Smith
tagline: Underwhelmed by corporate assignments, a private detective is approached by a client with the type of investigation he's longed for.

title: On the Day the School Bus Left Us
overview: A hideous crime beside a Catholic school in Carcar City, Cebu—the girly and mischievous Oona and the silent and plain Tris, both raised by their single mothers, conspire to hide this on an afternoon when the school bus had forgotten about them.

title: Insurance Jimmy
overview: Seemingly ordinary insurance agent Jimmy's life takes a dramatic turn overnight.

title: Paixão Sinistra
overview: The heir of a major criminal commands death squads under his father's orders. In parallel, the mysterious M tortures a killer in order to obtain information about the whereabouts of three missing youngsters.
tagline: A CRIME MOVIE

title: The Safe
overview: A taxi driver, a police woman, and a barkeeper are stealing a safe from a drug kingpin, soon realizing that he and his goon are after them to get it back, while the taxi driver sets up his own escape plan.

title: Accomplices
overview: When a politician's son is abducted by two brothers in their first kidnap, trouble comes unannounced.
tagline: Part 1

title: He Thought He Died
overview: A painter plots a heist to steal back his own painting from the same museum vault where a filmmaker is shooting their next project.

title: Family Fortunes
overview: A Serbian mother and daughter transform the domestic drudgery of cleaning the family silver into a reflection on how heirlooms embody their owners' histories. Stories of war, displacement and revolution emerge as the tarnish is polished off, like a genie rubbed out of a lamp, and recollections reconnect them to their relatives through the shared objects that have touched all of their lives.

title: Digofus
overview: When there is a worldwide shortage of Max's favourite beverage, he must go to the only man in the country who has it.
tagline: THERE IS NO FORCE STRONGER THAN THE ONE PUSHING SOMEONE TOWARDS WHAT THEY DESIRE

title: Misterio De Familia
overview: In a small town where everyone knows each other, the Hernandez family struggles to bury a dangerous secret. In hopes to cover it up and start anew, would they succeed or will they only add it to their growing list of dark secrets?
